scripts.migrate:status: node -e "const {Client}=require('pg');require('dotenv').config({path:'.env.local'});(async()=>{const c=new Client({connectionString:process.env.DATABASE_URL});await c.connect();const r=await c.query('SELECT version,applied_at FROM schema_migrations ORDER BY applied_at');console.log('Applied migrations:',r.rows.length===0?'None':r.rows.map(x=>x.version).join(', '));await c.end();})()"
